actions.message:
```-Command List-
The command tag for all commands is “:”
:outlw - Will randomly select from the comment list.
:level - Will display your current chat level.
:gamble - 50:50 winning odds.
:fucks - Will display your balance of fucks.
:bet (amount) - 60:40 double or nothing.
:hicard (amount) - Highest card wins.
:rob (@user) - 50:50 odds. Will attempt to rob the mentioned user.
:buybeer 10 - Will spend 10 Fucks for a beer.
:buywine 15 - Will spend 15 Fucks for wine.
:buyfood 50 - Will spend 50 Fucks for food.
:buyshots 20 - Will spend 20 Fucks for shots.
:payforsex 10000 - Will pay for a random sex scenario.
:bank - Checks your bank balance.
:deposit (amount) - Used to deposit available fucks into your bank.
:withdraw (amount) - Used to withdraw available fucks from your bank
:check (@user) - Checks the mentioned users available fucks.
:nofucks - Sets your available balance to zero.
:jackpot - 1:20 odds for 10,000 fucks.
:punch (@user)
:kick (@user)
:kiss (@user)
:slap (@user)
:hug (@user)```
